title: UPDATE 3-Super League summaries
text: April 15, 2018 / 4:05 PM / in an hour UPDATE 3-Super League summaries Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Apr 15 (OPTA) - summaries from the Super League matches on Sunday Castleford (19) 41 Tries: McShane (14,45), Shenton (19), Holmes (23,69), Clare (48), Wardle (66) Goals: Gale (16,21,24,46,49,70) Drop Goals: Gale (39) Catalans (0) 0 Referee: Scott Mikalauskas Ground: The Mend-A-Hose Jungle Huddersfield (6) 12 Tries: Senior (22), Roberts (54) Goals: Brough (23,55) Red cards: Brough (75) Salford (12) 30 Tries: Flanagan (11), Nakubuwai (14), Hauraki (50), Bibby (77,79) Goals: Lui (12,15,44,51,71) Referee: James Child Ground: Kirklees Stadium Wakefield (22) 24 Tries: Jones-Bishop (6), Lyne (13), Horo (16), Tupou (22) Goals: Finn (6,13,18,71) Yellow cards: Randell (74) St Helens (14) 20 Tries: Percival (1,39), Makinson (25), Douglas (46) Goals: Richardson (2,47) Yellow cards: Percival (77) Referee: Gareth Hewer Ground: The Mobile Rocket Stadium Thursday, April 19 fixtures (GMT) Hull v Leeds (17:45) Friday, April 20 fixtures (GMT) Wigan v Castleford (17:45) Salford v Wakefield (18:00) St Helens v Huddersfield (18:00)
